name: CurrentEvents
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Reaches out to the Five Things to Know source file, produced and updated by CNN, and plays the relatively short sound your Alexa device. Simply say something along the line of "Alexa play my flash briefing" and listen in for important events.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
